about_the_game:
OVERVIEW


My Daily Pets is a game about taking care of alien pets and investigating their origin. Give them their favorite food, play with them, train them and dance. Become the best alien pet investigator!

Some extraordinary creatures have recently been discovered!

You, an important Researcher, have been the person chosen to take care of them and thus discover all their magical and fun characteristics.

What will they feed on? What do they like to play? Where do they come from? Find out everything about those pets and become the best investigator!

You would be able to train your pet and teach it to dance. Take care of your pet to develop a bond and be the best galaxy pet investigator.

As the player takes care of the pet, its level bar will increase and it will level up. Each time you level up a new discovery of the species will appear, new items will be unlocked in the shop and new abilities that you can learn.

You're a Research Scientist!


The player is a scientist who must investigate the origin of the pets and, for this, he will have his own Investigation Journal, a notebook where he could write all the discoveries of the pets. In his own Investigation Journal, characteristics such as its name, age or state of health also appear.

Take care of your pet!


In 'My Daily Pets', the resercher must take care of his pet by viewing his status bars, those are:

  • Happiness: Love bar of the pet towards the player, if he caresses or plays with it.
  • Sleep: Bar that shows the tiredness of the pet.
  • Hunger: Hunger bar that the pet has.
  • Hydration: Bar that indicates if the pet needs to drink.
  • Health: Bar measures the pet's health.

Train your alien pet!


The player could train the pet and teach it gestures such as sitting or pawing. The more gestures the pet learns, the more befriended it will become with you!

Buy their favorite toys!


The player can buy toys and play with them. Your pet could play ball on the field, play the piano or jump rope. It will be happier if you play with it!



These adorable pets are looking forward to meeting you!
